sources.title: Make Believe Revue (1935)
sources.description: Flown away to the land of the story books, Jack and Jill, aided by Mother Goose, watch a fairland revue complete with chorus girls and marching soldiers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/make-believe-revue-1935/

metadata.Plot: Flown away to the land of the story books, Jack and Jill, aided by Mother Goose, watch a fairland revue complete with chorus girls and marching soldiers.
